name: Serious Coin
description: Meme coin season is over. It’s time to get $SERIOUS Serious Coin ($SERIOUS) is a serious project. Utilizing revolutionary blockchain technology, Serious Coin is recreating and redefining what a “serious” investment looks like in the modern age. Through simple and elegant design, clear articulation, and efficient execution, the team at Serious Coin endeavors to drive blockchain adoption and provide education in ways that are fun and easily accessible to the masses.
